ygData.subject: Re: RE: Hunting at 14
ygData.msgSnippet: for L14 i was still in S Ro killing dervs.  at 15 i either got very little xp or none, cant remember.  if you have a group go to oasis (if money isnt
ygData.messageBody:
for L14 i was still in S Ro killing dervs. at 15 i either got very little
xp or none, cant remember. if you have a group go to oasis (if money isnt
important). sister island i went to last night, but all the sisters i saw
were red or green (at L16).

belphenor


>From: srutkowski@...
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] RE: Hunting at 14
>Date: Thu, 15 Jul 1999 09:01:37 -0500
>
>From: srutkowski@...
>
>
>
>You kill the NPC vendors on the sister island in OOT? I thought they were
>higher level than that. Playing a dark elf necro and binding yourself in
>Freeport is not something I would do, even if I killed "one MILLION" orcs.
>
>My 2 cents as I am also search for a place to hunt at 14. Lavasotrm is
>good-
>even killed several fire elementals and rock dervs. But the place that I
>camped
>I kept getting trained by everything- Fire ele's, Imps, and even that
>paladin.
>Anyone know what level he is? Anyway, I was zoning too much to make and
>good,
>consistent exp gains.
>
> >>By far sister island is the best place to hunt for xp and money <snip>
> >>BTW you would be killing sisters or Eroslilli or
>something like that. a good thing to keep in mind is to bind yourself to
>Freeport in front of the vendor on the dock because you will be so loaded
>down you will hardly be able to move.
>
>
